nl.strohalm.cyclos.services.transactions
Interface ScheduledPaymentService

All Superinterfaces:
Service
All Known Subinterfaces:
ScheduledPaymentServiceLocal
All Known Implementing Classes:
ScheduledPaymentServiceImpl, ScheduledPaymentServiceSecurity
public interface ScheduledPaymentService
extends Service

Service interface for scheduled payments

Author:
Jefferson Magno

Method Summary
 ScheduledPayment block(ScheduledPayment scheduledPayment)
          Blocks a scheduled payment
 boolean canBlock(ScheduledPayment scheduledPayment)
          Returns whether the logged user can block a scheduled payment

          Returns whether the logged user can cancel a scheduled payment

          Cancels a scheduled payment

          Checks whether the given transfer can be paid immediately

          Returns details of a scheduled payment

                      Relationship... fetch)

processTransfer

Transfer processTransfer(Transfer transfer)
Process a scheduled payment transfer

Returns:
The main transfer. It may contain children transfers (generated, for example, by fees)
Throws:
NotEnoughCreditsException - The account does not have enough credits
MaxAmountPerDayExceededException - The account has exceeded the maximum transaction amount per day for the specified transfer type
UnexpectedEntityException - Either transfer type or payment receiver are invalid
UpperCreditLimitReachedException - The payment cannot be performed because it would make the receiving account go beyond the upper credit limit
InvalidPaymentReceiverException - When the given DoPaymentDTO is not a member

search

java.util.List<ScheduledPayment> search(ScheduledPaymentQuery query)
Searches for scheduled payments

unblock

ScheduledPayment unblock(ScheduledPayment scheduledPayment)
Unblocks a scheduled payment
